FAQs 

 Q1. What is “One-day-volunteer”?
 Ans. One-day-volunteer is a programme under which you can tell your time at which you will be available for various volunteering activities and we will assign you according to your schedule.

 Q2.What is “Pack-a-gift”?
 Ans. Pack-a-gift is our scheme in which you can donate you’re not in use products and things and it will be our responsibility to deliver them to the needy hands.

 Q3.What is your Internship criteria?
 Ans. In our internships forum we will provide you with a set of sources and links from where you can turn your dreams into real ity by contributing to the society through very famous firms and NGOs. 

Q4. What are my social points? 
Ans. Your social points will indicate the amount of your contribution to the society in the form of campaigns, teachings, workshops etc. You can showcase your social points at the time of your job interview and gain some benefits through it.
